body.p:
Scottsville Ky. May 20th 1862
To his excellency B. Magoffin Governor of the state of Kentucky.
Annexed you will find the resignation of R. W. Edmunds Justice of the peace in Civil District No. 1. in Allen County -- and I recommend that you appoint S. L. Morgan in his place.

yours most respectfully
Wm Mansfield Co. Judge

Scottsville Allen County Kentucky
May 10th 1862
To his Excellency B Magoffin.
Gov of Kentucky

Having heretofore resigned the office of Justice of the peace in the first civil district in Allen County Kentucky Which from some cause is informal in some manner You will therefore please accept this as my resignation of said office of Justice of the peace in & for the first civil district in Allen County State of Kentucky Said resignation to date if proper from the 13th of January last the date of my former resignation and if the vacancy cannot date from that time then from this date.

Allen Co
J. P. Dist No
1 appointed
Mar 19. 1862
